description:
Natsu Yasumi is the younger brother of Mikan, though is much taller than her and looks older than most boys his age. Due to his sister`s infatuation with Sunao, Yasumi is annoyed at his sister`s personality when around Sunao and will often break up any chance for Mikan to have some time alone with Sunao. It is also hinted that he has an attraction to his sister.
His name is a pun on the Japanese word natsuyasumi (夏休み) meaning summer vacation.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Natsu Yasumi
